xdi2.client.manipulator

Interface MessageManipulator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Manipulator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMessageManipulator, SetCorrelationMessageManipulator, SetFromPeerRootMessageManipulator, SetLinkContractMessageManipulator, SetMessageTypeMessageManipulator, SetParameterMessageManipulator, SetSecretTokenMessageManipulator, SetTimestampMessageManipulator, SetToPeerRootMessageManipulator, SigningManipulator

    public interface MessageManipulator
extends Manipulator
    This is used to manipulate messages e.g. before sending them or after receiving them.
    Author:
    markus
    See Also:
    XDIAbstractClient, ManipulatingInterceptor

                ManipulationContext manipulationContext)
         throws Xdi2ClientException
        Manipulate a message.
